accuracy: ±10 W/m2 or ±5%, whichever is greater, under sunlight; Additional temperature-induced error ±0.38 W/m2/°C from 25°C
angular_accuracy: Cosine corrected from 0 to 80 degrees from vertical
operational_temperature_range: -25° to 60°C with rechargeable batteries; -40 to 70°C with lithium batteries
transmission_range: Up to 600 meters line of sight
max_sensors: Up to 50 wireless sensors or 336 data channels per HOBO RX station
battery_type: Two 1.2 V AA NiMH rechargeable batteries or two 1.5 V AA lithium batteries
battery_life: 3–5 years with NiMH; 1 year with lithium, under normal use

materials.sensor: Anodized aluminum housing with acrylic diffuser and sealing ring
